scripts.build: echo 'No build step needed for Remotion Studio'
scripts.render:all: npx remotion render src/index.ts ApiOverview out/api-overview.mp4 && npx remotion render src/index.ts SocialClip out/social-clip.mp4 && npx remotion render src/index.ts SocialClipSquare out/social-clip-square.mp4 && npx remotion render src/index.ts SocialClipPortrait out/social-clip-portrait.mp4 && npx remotion render src/index.ts TerminalDemo out/terminal-demo.mp4
